alert.note: Alert for Alger; Baraga; Gogebic; Luce; Marquette; Northern Schoolcraft; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 9:41AM EST until December 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Alger, Luce, Baraga, Marquette, Ontonagon, Gogebic, Southern Schoolcraft, Southern Houghton and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ this evening to 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects, including holiday decorations, or bring them into a safe location prior to the onset of winds. People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Alger; Baraga; Gogebic; Luce; Marquette; Northern Schoolcraft; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton; Southern Schoolcraft
